rules.name: Lucky Six Rule Check 1
rules.query: SELECT game_id, winner, banker_final_score, is_lucky_six FROM game_records WHERE banker_final_score = 6 AND winner != 'Banker' AND is_lucky_six = 1
rules.description: Lucky Six is marked but winner is not Banker with score 6
rules.chinese_description: 標記了幸運六但贏家不是莊家或莊家分數不是6點

rules.name: Lucky Six Rule Check 2
rules.query: SELECT game_id, winner, banker_final_score, is_lucky_six FROM game_records WHERE banker_final_score = 6 AND winner = 'Banker' AND is_lucky_six = 0
rules.description: Banker wins with score 6 but Lucky Six is not marked
rules.chinese_description: 莊家以6點獲勝但未標記幸運六

rules.name: Natural Hand Check
rules.query: SELECT game_id, banker_initial_score, player_initial_score, banker_third_card, player_third_card FROM game_records WHERE (banker_initial_score BETWEEN 8 AND 9 OR player_initial_score BETWEEN 8 AND 9) AND (banker_third_card IS NOT NULL OR player_third_card IS NOT NULL)
rules.description: Natural hand (8 or 9) but has third card
rules.chinese_description: 有自然牌(8或9點)但仍補了第三張牌

rules.name: Final Score Natural Check
rules.query: SELECT game_id, player_final_score, banker_final_score, player_third_card, banker_third_card FROM game_records WHERE (player_final_score BETWEEN 8 AND 9 OR banker_final_score BETWEEN 8 AND 9) AND (player_third_card IS NOT NULL OR banker_third_card IS NOT NULL)
rules.description: Final score is natural (8 or 9) but has third card
rules.chinese_description: 最終分數為自然牌(8或9點)但有第三張牌

rules.name: Player Win Check
rules.query: SELECT game_id, player_final_score, banker_final_score, winner FROM game_records WHERE player_final_score > banker_final_score AND winner != 'Player'
rules.description: Player score is higher but winner is not Player
rules.chinese_description: 玩家分數較高但贏家不是玩家

rules.name: Banker Win Check
rules.query: SELECT game_id, player_final_score, banker_final_score, winner FROM game_records WHERE banker_final_score > player_final_score AND winner != 'Banker'
rules.description: Banker score is higher but winner is not Banker
rules.chinese_description: 莊家分數較高但贏家不是莊家

rules.name: Tie Check
rules.query: SELECT game_id, player_final_score, banker_final_score, winner FROM game_records WHERE player_final_score = banker_final_score AND winner != 'Tie'
rules.description: Scores are equal but winner is not Tie
rules.chinese_description: 分數相同但未判定為和局

rules.name: Player Draw Rule Check
rules.query: SELECT game_id, player_initial_score, player_third_card FROM game_records WHERE player_initial_score <= 5 AND player_third_card IS NULL
rules.description: Player score <= 5 but no third card drawn
rules.chinese_description: 玩家分數小於等於5點但未補牌

rules.name: Score Consistency Check
rules.query: SELECT game_id, player_initial_score, banker_initial_score, player_final_score, banker_final_score, player_third_card, banker_third_card FROM game_records WHERE player_third_card IS NULL AND banker_third_card IS NULL AND (player_initial_score != player_final_score OR banker_initial_score != banker_final_score)
rules.description: Initial and final scores mismatch without third card
rules.chinese_description: 無補牌情況下初始分數與最終分數不一致

rules.name: Score Range Check
rules.query: SELECT game_id, player_initial_score, banker_initial_score, player_final_score, banker_final_score FROM game_records WHERE player_initial_score NOT BETWEEN 0 AND 9 OR banker_initial_score NOT BETWEEN 0 AND 9 OR player_final_score NOT BETWEEN 0 AND 9 OR banker_final_score NOT BETWEEN 0 AND 9

rules.name: Winner Value Check
rules.query: SELECT game_id, winner FROM game_records WHERE winner NOT IN ('Player', 'Banker', 'Tie')

rules.name: Lucky Six Type Check
rules.query: SELECT game_id, lucky_six_type, banker_final_score, winner, is_lucky_six FROM game_records WHERE (lucky_six_type IS NOT NULL AND (banker_final_score != 6 OR winner != 'Banker' OR is_lucky_six = 0))
rules.chinese_description: 無效的幸運六類型配置

rules.name: Third Card Rule Check
rules.query: SELECT game_id, player_third_card, player_initial_score, banker_third_card, banker_initial_score FROM game_records WHERE (player_third_card IS NOT NULL AND player_initial_score > 5) OR (banker_third_card IS NOT NULL AND banker_initial_score > 6)

rules.name: Banker Draw Rule Check
rules.query: SELECT game_id, banker_initial_score, banker_third_card FROM game_records WHERE banker_initial_score <= 2 AND banker_third_card IS NULL
rules.description: Banker score <= 2 but no third card drawn
rules.chinese_description: 莊家分數小於等於2點但未補牌

rules.name: Banker No Draw Rule Check
rules.query: SELECT game_id, banker_initial_score, banker_third_card FROM game_records WHERE banker_initial_score = 7 AND banker_third_card IS NOT NULL
rules.description: Banker score is 7 but drew third card
rules.chinese_description: 莊家分數為7點但仍補牌

rules.name: Duplicate Card Check
rules.query: SELECT game_id, player_initial_cards, banker_initial_cards, player_third_card, banker_third_card FROM game_records WHERE (SUBSTRING_INDEX(player_initial_cards, ',', 1) = SUBSTRING_INDEX(player_initial_cards, ',', -1) OR player_initial_cards = banker_initial_cards OR (player_third_card IS NOT NULL AND (player_third_card = SUBSTRING_INDEX(player_initial_cards, ',', 1) OR player_third_card = SUBSTRING_INDEX(player_initial_cards, ',', -1) OR player_third_card = SUBSTRING_INDEX(banker_initial_cards, ',', 1) OR player_third_card = SUBSTRING_INDEX(banker_initial_cards, ',', -1))) OR (banker_third_card IS NOT NULL AND (banker_third_card = SUBSTRING_INDEX(player_initial_cards, ',', 1) OR banker_third_card = SUBSTRING_INDEX(player_initial_cards, ',', -1) OR banker_third_card = SUBSTRING_INDEX(banker_initial_cards, ',', 1) OR banker_third_card = SUBSTRING_INDEX(banker_initial_cards, ',', -1) OR (player_third_card IS NOT NULL AND banker_third_card = player_third_card))))

rules.name: Card Format Check
rules.query: SELECT game_id, player_initial_cards, banker_initial_cards FROM game_records WHERE player_initial_cards NOT REGEXP '^[HSDC][2-9TJQKA],[HSDC][2-9TJQKA]$' OR banker_initial_cards NOT REGEXP '^[HSDC][2-9TJQKA],[HSDC][2-9TJQKA]$'

rules.name: Third Card Format Check
rules.query: SELECT game_id, player_third_card, banker_third_card FROM game_records WHERE (player_third_card IS NOT NULL AND player_third_card NOT REGEXP '^[HSDC][2-9TJQKA]$') OR (banker_third_card IS NOT NULL AND banker_third_card NOT REGEXP '^[HSDC][2-9TJQKA]$')
